plastic.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a plastic substance can be formed into many different shapes and keeps the shape it is formed into until someone changes it
plastic.translation[0].definitions[2].de: something that is plastic looks or tastes artificial or not natural
plastic.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: I hate that plastic smile of hers.
plastic.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a light strong material that is produced by a chemical process, and which can be made into different shapes when it is soft
plastic.translation[1].definitions[1].de: small plastic cards that are used to pay for things instead of money
plastic.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: ‘I haven’t got any cash.’ ‘Don’t worry, I’ll stick it on the plastic  (=pay for it using a credit card).’
Do they take plastic? (=can you pay using a credit card?)
plastic.translation[2].definitions[0].de: a CREDIT CARD, or credit cards in general
plastic.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: I’m going to have to pay for this with plastic.
